it.polimi.se2018

Class DraftPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.DraftPool

  • public class DraftPool
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes DraftPool behavior. A die can be placed in the draftPool, removed from it, rolled or switched with another one (not in de draftPool). The number of present dice can be returned as well.
    Author:
    Alessio Molinari, Nives Migotto

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DraftPool(DiceBag diceBag, int playersNumber)
      Constructor: generates a draftPool by taking from the dicebag 2 dice for each player + 1

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Die getDie(int index)

      Places a die in the draftPool
      void rollDice()
      Rolls all dice in the draftPool (gives all dice a new random value)
      Die switchDie(Die toBeSwitched)
      Switches a die with a random one
      Die switchDie(int diePosition, Die toBeSwitched)
      Switches a die with a given one
